text: Kaadu sinaamak islaamaninnot agay-waagat culaah, Yalla agay- waagat yaqbude mari yan qalek heeril soola numih innah, tokkel maqaane geek ruffu edde iyyaah, bal√° kaa geytek korraaqaah edde suge koroosannuh yaduure, usuk tohul addunyaa kee akeera isik finqiseh, too fingi usuk baxxaqqa iyya finqa kinni
